ratings.comment: Professor Portales is very enthusiastic and caring to his students. However, the homework is very challenging, and the exams are extremely hard, the average is usually below 50. I found that about 80 students enrolled in MATH 521 at the beginning of the semester, but about 30 of them dropped the course before the drop deadline.

Professor Beltran is fantastic! There is not much else to say. It is difficult to find a mathematics professor that lectures well and has good hand-writing. Real Analysis is the bane of every mathematics major's existence, but Professor Beltran makes it very easy to understand with challenging homework assignments and amazing intuition.

Best professor I ever take in math class! His lecture is brief and sometimes feels rush, but it's a solid point as you will need to work through similar stuff in hw. Homework is tough but interesting. His exam is also tough but the curve is nice. Sometimes he uses unused homework in the exam, so do ALL homework even if he asks for few questions.
